com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface TitanVertex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<TitanElement>, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element, com.thinkaurelius.titan.util.datastructures.Removable, TitanElement, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TitanKey, TitanLabel, TitanType

    public interface TitanVertex
extends TitanElement, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex
    TitanVertex is the basic unit of a TitanGraph. It extends the functionality provided by Blueprint's Vertex by helper and convenience methods.
    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)

    • Method Detail

      • addEdge

        TitanEdge addEdge(TitanLabel label,
                TitanVertex vertex)
        Creates a new edge incident on this vertex.

        Creates and returns a new TitanEdge of the specified label with this vertex being the outgoing vertex and the given vertex being the incoming vertex.

        Parameters:
        label - label of the edge to be created
        vertex - incoming vertex of the edge to be created
        Returns:
        new edge

      • addEdge

        TitanEdge addEdge(String label,
                TitanVertex vertex)
        Creates a new edge incident on this vertex.

        Creates and returns a new TitanEdge of the specified label with this vertex being the outgoing vertex and the given vertex being the incoming vertex.
        Automatically creates the edge label if it does not exist and automatic creation of types is enabled. Otherwise, this method with throw an IllegalArgumentException.

        Parameters:
        label - label of the edge to be created
        vertex - incoming vertex of the edge to be created
        Returns:
        new edge

      • addProperty

        TitanProperty addProperty(TitanKey key,
                        Object attribute)
        Creates a new property for this vertex and given key with the specified attribute.

        Creates and returns a new TitanProperty for the given key on this vertex with the specified object being the attribute.

        Parameters:
        key - key of the property to be created
        attribute - attribute of the property to be created
        Returns:
        New property
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the attribute does not match the data type of the property key.

      • addProperty

        TitanProperty addProperty(String key,
                        Object attribute)
        Creates a new property for this vertex and given key with the specified attribute.

        Creates and returns a new TitanProperty for the given key on this vertex with the specified object being the attribute.
        Automatically creates the property key if it does not exist and automatic creation of types is enabled. Otherwise, this method with throw an IllegalArgumentException.

        Parameters:
        key - key of the property to be created
        attribute - attribute of the property to be created
        Returns:
        New property
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the attribute does not match the data type of the property key.

      • query

        TitanVertexQuery query()
        Starts a new TitanQuery for this vertex.

        Initializes and returns a new TitanVertexQuery centered on this vertex.

        Specified by:
        query in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex
        Returns:
        New TitanQuery for this vertex
        See Also:
        TitanVertexQuery

      • getProperties

        Iterable<TitanProperty> getProperties()
        Returns an iterable over all properties incident on this vertex.

        There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the properties are returned. All properties incident on this vertex are returned irrespective of their key.

        Returns:
        Iterable over all properties incident on this vertex

      • getProperties

        Iterable<TitanProperty> getProperties(TitanKey key)
        Returns an iterable over all properties of the specified property key incident on this vertex.

        There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the properties are returned. All returned properties are of the specified key.

        Parameters:
        key - TitanKey of the returned properties
        Returns:
        Iterable over all properties of the specified key incident on this vertex

      • getProperties

        Iterable<TitanProperty> getProperties(String key)
        Returns an iterable over all properties of the specified property key incident on this vertex.

        There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the properties are returned. All returned properties are of the specified key.

        Parameters:
        key - key of the returned properties
        Returns:
        Iterable over all properties of the specified key incident on this vertex

      • getTitanEdges

        Iterable<TitanEdge> getTitanEdges(com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Direction d,
                                TitanLabel... labels)
        Returns an iterable over all edges of the specified edge label in the given direction incident on this vertex.

        There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the edges are returned. All returned edges have the given label and the direction of the edge from the perspective of this vertex matches the specified direction.

        Parameters:
        labels - label of the returned edges
        d - Direction of the returned edges with respect to this vertex
        Returns:
        Iterable over all edges with the given label and direction incident on this vertex

      • getEdges

        Iterable<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge> getEdges(com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Direction d,
                                               String... labels)
        Returns an iterable over all edges of the specified edge label in the given direction incident on this vertex.

        There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the edges are returned. All returned edges have the given label and the direction of the edge from the perspective of this vertex matches the specified direction.

        Specified by:
        getEdges in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex
        Parameters:
        labels - label of the returned edges
        d - Direction of the returned edges with respect to this vertex
        Returns:
        Iterable over all edges with the given label and direction incident on this vertex

      • getEdges

        Iterable<TitanEdge> getEdges()
        Returns an iterable over all edges incident on this vertex.

        There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the edges are returned.

        Returns:
        Iterable over all edges incident on this vertex

      • getRelations

        Iterable<TitanRelation> getRelations()
        Returns an iterable over all relations incident on this vertex.

        There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the relations are returned. Note, that this method potentially returns both TitanEdge and TitanProperty.

        Returns:
        Iterable over all properties and edges incident on this vertex.

      • getEdgeCount

        long getEdgeCount()
        Returns the number of edges incident on this vertex.

        Returns the total number of edges irrespective of label and direction. Note, that loop edges, i.e. edges with identical in- and outgoing vertex, are counted twice.

        Returns:
        The number of edges incident on this vertex.

      • getPropertyCount

        long getPropertyCount()
        Returns the number of properties incident on this vertex.

        Returns the total number of properties irrespective of key.

        Returns:
        The number of properties incident on this vertex.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Checks whether this vertex has at least one incident edge. In other words, it returns getEdgeCount()>0, but might be implemented more efficiently.
        Returns:
        true, if this vertex has at least one incident edge, else false

      • isModified

        boolean isModified()
        Checks whether this entity has been loaded into the current transaction and modified.
        Returns:
        True, has been loaded and modified, else false.
